description:
Implement Collaborative Playlist Creation with Real-Time Voting System

Build a comprehensive collaborative playlist feature that enables users to create shared playlists, invite collaborators, and collectively curate music through a voting-based suggestion system.

Requirements:

**Playlist Sharing & Collaboration**
- Create sharable playlists with configurable privacy settings (public, private, invite-only)
- Implement invitation system to add friends/users as collaborators
- Define role-based permissions (owner, editor, viewer) with different access levels
- Display list of current collaborators with their roles on playlist view
- Allow playlist owner to remove collaborators or transfer ownership

**Song Suggestion System**
- Enable collaborators to suggest songs for addition to the playlist
- Create a suggestions queue/section separate from the main playlist
- Display suggested songs with metadata (title, artist, album, duration)
- Show who suggested each song and when
- Allow users to withdraw their own suggestions

**Voting Mechanism**
- Implement upvote/downvote functionality for each suggested song
- Display vote counts and net score for each suggestion
- Prevent duplicate voting (one vote per user per song)
- Allow users to change their vote
- Sort suggestions by vote score, timestamp, or other criteria

**Real-Time Synchronization**
- Update suggestions and votes in real-time for all active collaborators
- Broadcast playlist changes (additions, removals, reordering) to all viewers
- Handle conflict resolution for simultaneous actions
- Show presence indicators for currently active collaborators

**Approval & Addition Workflow**
- Define threshold or rules for automatic song approval (e.g., +3 votes, owner approval)
- Allow playlist owner to manually approve/reject suggestions regardless of votes
- Automatically add approved songs to the playlist
- Notify collaborators when songs are added or rejected
- Archive or remove rejected suggestions

**Edge Cases & Constraints**
- Handle deleted/unavailable songs in suggestions
- Set limits on suggestion queue size per user or total
- Manage permissions when users leave or are removed from collaboration
- Handle playlist deletion and its impact on collaborators
- Validate song availability across different regions/platforms

**Technical Considerations**
- Choose real-time communication protocol (WebSockets, Server-Sent Events, polling)
- Design database schema for playlists, collaborators, suggestions, and votes
- Implement efficient queries for vote aggregation and ranking
- Add appropriate indexes for performance
- Consider caching strategy for frequently accessed playlist data

**User Experience**
- Provide clear visual distinction between main playlist and suggestions queue
- Show loading states during real-time updates
- Display notifications for new suggestions, votes, and approvals
- Include undo functionality for accidental actions
- Make voting interface intuitive and responsive
